sn35.154:1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe … ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca: "‘indriyasampanno, indriyasampanno’ti, bhante, vuccati. Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotī"ti?
sn35.154:2: "Cakkhundriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī vihāranto cakkhundriye nibbindati … pe … jivhindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī vihāranto jivhindriye nibbindati … pe … manindriye ce, bhikkhu, udayabbayānupassī vihāranto manindriye nibbindati. Nibbindaṁ virajjati … pe … vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti. ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti. Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhu, indriyasampanno hotī"ti.
